name: Ursaring
flavorText:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

previous.name: Teddiursa
previous.flavorText:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

next.name: Slugma
next.flavorText:
It never sleeps.
It has to keep
moving because if it stopped, its
magma body would
cool and harden.

pokemon.name: Ursaluna
pokemon.flavorText:
I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its
burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat
at will.
